extendedInfo.description: Free app to allow EMTs and RNs to easily calculate fluid resuscitation requirements for burn patients based on the Parkland formula.  Enter the patient weight, then enter the burn% or optionally select a patient image and graphically indicate the areas burned (anterior and posterior) for a closer approximation of the body surface area affected.  Full help included in Menu -> Help.  This has been tested on several devices, but please use the contact information under Help if your device isn't displaying properly so we can update.  This is rated Medium maturity due to nude adult images (to provide anatomical landmarks when indicating burns.)  Comments and suggestions made to the Play store are not automatically forwarded to the developers!  Please send any suggestions for improvement to DTsEMT@gmail.com, and Thanks!

reviews.title: Little to improve
reviews.comment: Con- The weight doesn\'t show when entered in the box.  The rest is nice to have for practice. Great for free.
reviews.author: JUSTIN ADAMS

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: It\'s easy to use. Just click on burned locations and walla!! Thx for this gr8 app. 5 stars rated plus 1 cookie
reviews.author: Serotoninlysis Deathology
